programme.title: Catch of the Day
programme.desc: On the eve of becoming a NY executive chef, Sophie returns home to help her family's flailing restaurant and runs into Cam, an old crush who makes her question everything. Stars Emilie Ullerup, Michael Rady, and Katie Lee Biegel.

programme.title: Always Amore
programme.desc: Struggling to keep her late husband's Italian restaurant afloat, a woman agrees to work with a professional consultant to see if they can turn things around. At first she's resistant, but as they get closer, she realizes not all change is bad.

programme.title: Love on the Menu
programme.desc: A popular chef rejects the idea of creating a gourmet frozen food line when the idea is presented by a food executive. But when the restaurant he runs with his wife faces financial problems, he reluctantly makes a deal.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose finds herself romantically involved for the first time since her husband's death.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche must decide whether to donate one of her kidneys to the sister she hates.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's attractive date flirts with Blanche, sparking a rivalry between the two.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's unruly teenage grandson visits, and goes out every night with a rough crowd.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Lorelai must ask her estranged parents for financial help when her daughter, Rory, is accepted into a prestigious prep school.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Lorelai oversleeps and accompanies her daughter to prep school wearing cut-off jeans and cowboy boots; Rory antagonizes Chilton's top student.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia challenges Dorothy to prove she is spry enough to take a trip to Italy.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: After a burglar enters the house, Rose buys a gun to feel more safe.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche dates a young aerobics instructor; Rose's mother, Alma Lindstrom, teaches her an important lesson.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The women bring their separate views of death into focus after Sophia suffers the symptoms of a heart attack.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory and her grandfather enjoy a glorious day of golf, making Lorelai feel left out; the inn hosts a double wedding with two sets of identical twins.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory becomes obsessive about studying for a Shakespeare exam after she receives her first D grade, but when she misses the exam it leads to a parent-teacher conference.

programme.title: The Wedding Veil Journey
programme.desc: Tracy and Nick agree to set aside work to make time for a long overdue honeymoon to Greece. However, they soon find themselves confronting life choices when they get stranded on a secluded island.

programme.title: All Summer Long
programme.desc: Tia's dream job of captaining a dining cruise hits rough water when her ex is hired as the restaurant's chef.

programme.title: Sailing Into Love
programme.desc: A biology teacher juggles her duties as bridesmaid to three friends, as well as teaching a summer enrichment class at her favorite place in the world.

programme.title: Love on the Danube: Love Song
programme.desc: A daughter traveling with her widowed mother and a son traveling with his widower father meet on a cruise; the two decide that their musical parents would make the perfect couple try to engineer a romance only to falling in love themselves.

programme.title: Catch of the Day
programme.desc: On the eve of becoming a NY executive chef, Sophie returns home to help her family's flailing restaurant and runs into Cam, an old crush who makes her question everything. Stars Emilie Ullerup, Michael Rady, and Katie Lee Biegel.

programme.title: The Chicken Sisters
programme.desc: It's Mae's bachelorette party, and Amanda commits to giving her notoriously over-planning sister a night full of carefree fun and making memories. Stars Schuyler Fisk, Genevieve Angelson, Lea Thompson, and Wendie Malick.

programme.title: Groundswell
programme.desc: On the heels of a personal and professional setback, chef Emma travels to Hawaii, where she meets Ben, a handsome, reclusive surf instructor whose lessons help her to regain her footing.

programme.title: Winter in Vail
programme.desc: A Los Angeles event coordinator learns that her estranged uncle has recently passed away and left her a chalet in Vail, Colo.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's ex-husband comes to town and spends the night with her.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia challenges Dorothy to prove she is spry enough to take a trip to Italy.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: After a burglar enters the house, Rose buys a gun to feel more safe.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche dates a young aerobics instructor; Rose's mother, Alma Lindstrom, teaches her an important lesson.

programme.desc: The women bring their separate views of death into focus after Sophia suffers the symptoms of a heart attack.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's ex-husband comes to town and spends the night with her.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory and her grandfather enjoy a glorious day of golf, making Lorelai feel left out; the inn hosts a double wedding with two sets of identical twins.

programme.title: Gilmore Girls
programme.desc: Rory becomes obsessive about studying for a Shakespeare exam after she receives her first D grade, but when she misses the exam it leads to a parent-teacher conference.

programme.title: Moonlight in Vermont
programme.desc: Fiona (Lacey Chabert), a New York City real estate broker, retreats to her family's quaint Vermont inn after being dumped by her boyfriend, Nate (Jesse Moss). When Nate shows up at the inn with a new girlfriend, Fiona devises a plan to win him back.

programme.title: The Color of Rain
programme.desc: While consoling each other over the recent loss of their spouses, a man (Warren Christie) and a woman (Lacey Chabert) grow close and fall in love.

programme.title: All of My Heart: The Wedding
programme.desc: Brian and Jenny are happy, engaged and busy planning their fall wedding. When a distant relative of Jenny's claims rights to Jenny and Brian's beloved inn, they must find a solution.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Teacher Adrien Murphy founds the after school program Kindness Club where she inspires kids to give back to the community; Lacey shows Adrien that kindness comes back to you with a surprise glamp-out to remember.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: 17-year old Makayla starts non-profit "Baila Conmigo" to offer free dance programs to children in need; Lacey and her team are ready to recognize this inspiring youth leader by throwing her a graduation party she'll never forget.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Liv created the Underdog Community Project to aid the overlooked unhoused community and their pets. Lacey Chabert and the team come together to celebrate and honor Liv's selfless dedication and big heart in a big way.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Partially deaf himself, high school senior Jonah volunteers at "No Limits", a nonprofit teaching deaf children skills to succeed; Lacey and her team are ready to throw this teen role model a true Hollywood red carpet gala.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Sheri founded Happy Hats to bring joy back to sick children while they receive treatment; Lacey is ready to throw Sheri an elegant Tea Party to help show how Happy Hats make a difference to all those who receive them, and beyond.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Teen Justin works tirelessly to save nearly 80 acres in the rainforests of Ecuador, home to many species of frogs; Lacey and her team throw him a rainforest celebration to honor his efforts and help him reach his goal.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Carmela is ready to lead her first solo mission with Mending Kids, providing medical care to sick children worldwide; Lacey prepares to send her off with a surprise fiesta that brings her back to her Peruvian roots.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Sophie volunteers at Ride On Therapeutic Horsemanship Center, assisting young riders and caring for the animals; Lacey teams up with Party Planners Lisa and Marisa to celebrate Sophie with a pre-Bat Mitzvah Party at the Barn.

programme.title: Celebrations With Lacey Chabert
programme.desc: Tanya is an LAFD firefighter who also mentors young women coming up the ranks; Lacey and her team put together an epic beachside event that will honor Tanya and showcase the incredible work she has done for her community.
